conversation.content: I'm looking for a hotel with a gym in Amsterdam. Any suggestions?
The CanalSide Hotel has a well-equipped 24/7 gym and is located near the central station. Rooms start around €140 per night. Should I check if they have availability for your dates?
Does the gym include cardio machines?

<think>

</think>

Yes, the gym at CanalSide Hotel does include cardio machines. Is there anything else I can tell you about the hotel?

That won't work if CanalSide's gym isn't truly 24/7 or has a limited cardio setup—I've already told you I need proper cardio access. Like I said before, confirm the 24/7 status and full equipment, or name a different Amsterdam hotel with real 24/7 gym access near the center. <END> bye
